editorText:
UPDATE Admissions
SET attending_doctor_id = 29
WHERE attending_doctor_id = 3;

UPDATE Admissions
SET patient_id = 4
WHERE patient_id = 35;

SELECT DISTINCT 
    'Doctors with Admissions' AS Query_Type, 
    d.doctor_id, 
    d.first_name, 
    d.last_name, 
    d.specialty, 
    NULL AS patient_id, 
    NULL AS gender, 
    NULL AS birth_date, 
    NULL AS city, 
    NULL AS province_id, 
    NULL AS allergies, 
    NULL AS height, 
    NULL AS weight
FROM Doctors d
JOIN Admissions a
ON d.doctor_id = a.attending_doctor_id

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT 
    'Doctors without Admissions' AS Query_Type, 
    d.doctor_id, 
    d.first_name, 
    d.last_name, 
    d.specialty, 
    NULL AS patient_id, 
    NULL AS gender, 
    NULL AS birth_date, 
    NULL AS city, 
    NULL AS province_id, 
    NULL AS allergies, 
    NULL AS height, 
    NULL AS weight
FROM Doctors d
WHERE d.doctor_id NOT IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT attending_doctor_id
    FROM Admissions
    WHERE attending_doctor_id IS NOT NULL
)

UNION ALL

SELECT DISTINCT 
    'Patients with Missing Doctor' AS Query_Type, 
    NULL AS doctor_id, 
    NULL AS first_name, 
    NULL AS last_name, 
    NULL AS specialty, 
    p.patient_id, 
    p.gender, 
    p.birth_date, 
    p.city, 
    p.province_id, 
    p.allergies, 
    p.height, 
    p.weight
FROM Patients p
JOIN Admissions a
ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id
WHERE a.attending_doctor_id IS NULL
   OR a.attending_doctor_id NOT IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM Doctors);
